I don't have access to the latest prices and promotions of hotels in bali. however, here are some tips to help you get the best value for your money:

1. check for promotions and packages: resorts in bali often have promotions and packages, which can include spa treatments, meals, and activities at a discounted rate. compare the packages and select the one that offers the most value.

2. consider the location: the resorts located in remote areas may offer a higher value for money, as they tend to be more affordable than those located in popular tourist areas.

3. check reviews: look at reviews of the hotel on various travel websites to get an idea of the level of service, amenities, and quality of the food. keep in mind that what one person considers value for money may differ from another person's opinion.

4. compare prices: use comparison sites to compare prices for the same dates across multiple booking platforms such as agoda, booking.com, or expedia. 

by following these tips, you can find the best value for money luxury resort that meets your preferences and budget.
